text: eksath jathika pakshaye mayi dina raliya boralla kambal pitiyedi pawathwena athara pradhana pelapaliya aarambha wuye maligawaththa pi di sirisena kridanganaya asalin.eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye mayi dina raliya da me wana wita aarambha wi athi athara eya pawathwenne galla - samanala kridanganayediyi.

ewani karunu kihipayak sadahan karanne nam, shri lankawa thula an kawaradakatath wada mewara nabithumage upandinaya wenuwen rajya anugrahaya labima, me nisama wiwidha jathin athara eya pulul sanwadayakata bhajanaya wi thibima, antharjalaya thula islam dahamata wiruddhawa anthawadiwa ha wiyaruwen kriya karana web adawinwala ha blogwala pasugiya dina kihipaye pradhana mathrukawa meya wima me dinaya nimithi kota jathika puwathpathwala palawu deshapalana prakasha wetha awadanaya yomu kirima mema wishaya pilibadawa muslim samajayata menma muslim nowana samajayata pawathina awama danuma me siyalla hamuwe apa rate bahuthara muslim prajawa kulmath wi gos imahath prithiyen ha handapiri sathutin mema uthsawaya samarima sadaha yodagath upakrama mewani karunu rashiyak mulika karagena mema mathrukawa pilibadawa keti awadhanayak yomu kirimata mehi adahas karana athara ee sadaha piwisumak lesa aarambhaye shuddha wu kuraan patayan dekak obage awadhanayata gena eemata kamaththemi.

rate inna nama giya nalu niliyan, deshapalakayin, kridakayin boho denek miniha andunanawa kiyala kiyanne.

bayibalaya dewa wachanaya apata idiripath karanne galawima labimatath kithunu jiwithayak gatha kirimatath apata awashya karunu karana penwa deyi. 2 pethras 1:3-4 prakasha karanawa “maknisada thaman wahansege mahimayen ha gunawanthakamen apa kandawagath thanan wahanse dana ganima karanakotagena, un wahansege diwya balayen jiwithayatath dewa bhakthiyatath adalawu siyalu de apata di thibe.”
"kalak thisse pawathi deshagunika ratawa mese wenaswima hethuwen apage sampradayika krushikarmika ratawan wenas wimata bhajanaya wuna.
